trans-unit.source: Abundance
trans-unit.target: Abundance

trans-unit.source: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

trans-unit.target: Target player reveals a number of cards from his or her hand equal to the number of Swamps you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

trans-unit.source: As the bridge snapped, Berko was sure he heard the swamp laughing at him.
trans-unit.target: As the bridge snapped, Berko was sure he heard the swamp laughing at him.

trans-unit.source: Pestilence Demon
trans-unit.target: Pestilence Demon

trans-unit.source: Flying {B}: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: Flying {B}: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

trans-unit.source: "I have schemed too long to be supplanted by dead gods. If I cannot have this world, no one can."
trans-unit.target: "I have schemed too long to be supplanted by dead gods. If I cannot have this world, no one can."

trans-unit.resname: DDR·57 | Priest of the Blood Rite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Priest of the Blood Rite
trans-unit.target: Priest of the Blood Rite

trans-unit.resname: DDR·57 | Priest of the Blood Rite | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Priest of the Blood Rite enters the battlefield, put a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: When Priest of the Blood Rite enters the battlefield, put a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.

trans-unit.resname: DDR·57 | Priest of the Blood Rite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some will sacrifice everything for but a taste of power.
trans-unit.target: Some will sacrifice everything for but a taste of power.

trans-unit.resname: DDR·58 | Quest for the Gravelord | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Quest for the Gravelord
trans-unit.target: Quest for the Gravelord

trans-unit.resname: DDR·58 | Quest for the Gravelord | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord. Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Put a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord. Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Put a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: Renegade Demon
trans-unit.target: Renegade Demon

trans-unit.source: Confront it at your own peril, for it will confront you for its own amusement.
trans-unit.target: Confront it at your own peril, for it will confront you for its own amusement.

trans-unit.resname: DDR·60 | Shadows of the Past | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shadows of the Past
trans-unit.target: Shadows of the Past

trans-unit.resname: DDR·60 | Shadows of the Past | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {4}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate this ability only if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {4}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate this ability only if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.

trans-unit.source: Smallpox
trans-unit.target: Smallpox

trans-unit.source: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.
trans-unit.target: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.

trans-unit.source: Take away a few things, and a rebellion may ensue. Take away everything, and the oppression will be accepted as fate.
trans-unit.target: Take away a few things, and a rebellion may ensue. Take away everything, and the oppression will be accepted as fate.

trans-unit.source: Squelching Leeches
trans-unit.target: Squelching Leeches

trans-unit.source: Squelching Leeches's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
trans-unit.target: Squelching Leeches's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

trans-unit.source: Setting foot in their muck is an open invitation.
trans-unit.target: Setting foot in their muck is an open invitation.

trans-unit.source: Tendrils of Corruption
trans-unit.target: Tendrils of Corruption

trans-unit.resname: DDR·63 | Tendrils of Corruption | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.
trans-unit.target: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

trans-unit.resname: DDR·63 | Tendrils of Corruption | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.
trans-unit.target: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

trans-unit.source: Unhallowed Pact
trans-unit.target: Unhallowed Pact

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

trans-unit.source: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.
trans-unit.target: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.
